alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 3:19PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weld County through 345 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Dacono, or 21 miles north of Denver, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and lots of penny size hail. Accumulating hail was reported on I-25 near Dacono. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Northern Thornton, northeastern Broomfield, Erie, Frederick and Dacono. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
